name: Google Authenticator Redesign
description:
Hi everyone.

I made this redesign of the Google Authenticator App, because is a mess when you have alot of PINS and when you want to look up for the desired PIN you can't find it fast.


So i came up with this new feature i called "PIN List" it make you create a list of your desired PINS like a playlist for musics.


And the PINS that you dont put on a "PIN List" it is automatically put on a list called "Other PINS" ("Other PINS" List show all the other PINS which is not in a PIN List)


I hope you like the redesign i made.

Ill make some updates on the file when something dont look right.


Buy me a coffe if you want :)
